description: Attribute Title is responded to by parameter t with a description: Title of movie or series
Attribute imdbID is responded to by parameter i with a description: A valid IMDb ID (e.g. tt0000001)
Attribute Type is responded to by parameter type with a description: Return movie, series or episode
Attribute Plot is responded to by parameter plot with a description: Return short or full plot
Attribute Year is responded to by parameter y with a description: Year of release
